main.name: Tanishq Singh Anand
main.description: Full Stack Developer | AI & ML Enthusiast
main.bio: I’m a Computer Science Engineering student and full-stack developer with hands-on experience in React, Next.js, Node.js, and Firebase. I secured 3rd place in the Papa React NFT Drop Hackathon, building and deploying a complete web application under competitive pressure. I’ve also earned the IBM Data Science Professional Certificate, strengthening my foundation in Python, data analysis, and machine learning. I’m passionate about combining full-stack development with AI to build intelligent, data-driven applications.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.
